lines.transliteration_english: Kat Poun Drisati Daras Hui Parasapara , Bhaavanee Bhagati Bhaai Sayvaa Liv Laaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When will I have face to face glimpse of the True Guru and receive His grace? Therefore I should engross my mind in the loving worship and devotion of the Lord.
